title: Qhome Luxury Soft Velvet Turban Velour Hair Cover Headwrap Hijab Hat
features: Material: offered in stretchy, light weight fabrics including Cotton Knit, Sweater Knit, Blended Knit, Sequined and Ruffle Fabric.
Casual basic that will be a wardrobe staple.
Relaxed cut for a comfy fit. Full head coverage.
One Size Fits Most. Can be worn by women with or without hair.
Washing Instructions: Hand Wash or Machine Wash, Cold, Gentle Cycle. Dry Flat or Hang to Dry. Do Not Bleach.
description: Soft Jersey Knit Sleep and Chemo Caps are Available in Many Sizes and Many Different Colors!

These caps are soft enough to wear for sleep. Made of soft jersey knit material this is a premium quality piece of headwear. Cover your head for fun, fashion on the beach or by the pool. Available in many colors, our lightweight hair hats are great for year round use! In addition our hair covers are ideal for patients suffering from Alopecia, Severe Hair and Chemotheraphy.  **Perfect to help protect or totally conceal a bald head from the sun. **Comfortable headwear for chemotherapy or cancer paitents **Athletic look headwear for sports and for the gym **For women undergoing hair loss due to cancer chemotherapy treatments, Alopecia or other medically related hair loss. It is a stylish and comfortable alternative to wigs and tying head scarves. Also for women daily wear or women who just has baby. **All caps are one size fits most. **Multiple colors to choose,all fashion and beautiful.
